value: John Reed, Illustration for Publisher's Weekly (XX, No. 21-22, November 1881, p. 644)

label: Description
value: Left, profile of figure with hat and mustache standing, with hand on hip leaning on wooden fence. Right, figure plowing with tow horses. Forest in background.
Mynheer Ten Broek, Illustration for Publisher's Weekly (XX, No. 21-22, November 1881, p. 645)

label: Description
value: Center background, figures by a bay huddled around figure laying on the ground. Bottom, two rabbits on a piece of clothing.
The Witch’s Daughter, Illustration for Harper's New Monthly Magazine (CCCXCVIII, No. LXVII, July 1883, frontispiece)

label: Description
value: An owl and woman in long white dress sitting on crescent moon. The woman sits on the right and looking down at owl sitting to her left.

label: Physical description
value: Printed in black ink on paper
A Spring Idyl, Illustration for The Book Buyer (III, No. 10, November 1886, p. 443)

label: Description
value: Left, profile of woman sitting, looking at two swans swimming in pond; center, two white swans facing left, swimming. Vegetation throughout.

label: Physical description
value: Wood engraving in black ink on paper
Illustrations for "A Wheel Around the Hub," Scribner's Monthly (XIX, No. 4, February 1880)

label: Description
value: Top; upper left, man riding bike, waving hat, down a road. Lower left, back of a centaur walking up the path, hands out in surprised. Vegetation at either side of the road. Image labeled with title, An Unexpected Meeting. Bottom; bicycle wheels, feet peddling; lower right pair of feet intertwined. Labelled and titled, Winners or Losers by Half a Length

label: Description
value: Top, article clipping from, "Around the Hub,” figures riding bikes down a road, passing children; right, school house with figure standing by doorway. Labelled and titled, Passing a School. Bottom, article clipping from, "The Painters of America"; left, profile of figure sitting with long white dress staring at cranes. Right, group of cranes huddled together. On balcony, with tree to the left.
Gregory, Illustration for Harper's New Monthly Magazine (LXVIII, No. CCCCIII, December 1883, p. 17)

label: Description
value: Left, figure dressed in robe, possibly a saint, bending down to face figure to the right; right, profile of figure in rags sitting with shepherd staff looking over and extending arms to man in robe. Light shines behind the figure to the right, vegetation in the background.

label: Physical description
value: Etching in black ink on paper

label: Description
value: Left, profile of figure sitting by water bend, with staff in hand, facing cranes, right. Right, two cranes standing, facing viewer.

label: Physical description
value: Etching in black ink on paper
From "Etching" [Cassell & Co.], Illustration for The Book Buyer (III, No. 1, February 1886, p. 10)

label: Description
value: Left; profile of young mermaid out of water, facing right, hands out extended in front of her, holding her up. Right; bird facing mermaid.

label: Description
value: Right, pensive black bear with right elbow on knee and hand under chin. Left, bird singing, perched on twig or blade of grass

label: Description
value: Left, cupid sitting on knees holding up heart to young girl, in front of cupid basket of hearts. Right, figure of girl with hands behind her back looking down at cupid, smiling. Vegetation, left and right; right, tree with bird nest and bird.

label: Physical description
value: Printed in black ink on paper

label: Description
value: Left, profile of figure sitting on grass with shepherd’s crane, facing a lamb and mother. Left, lamb and mother, lamb facing and starring intently at figure. Tree in left background.

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Two fashionably dressed women walking past a hat shop.  A bonnet on a hat stand in the show window at left.  Both women wearing gray hooped skirts, poke bonnets, three-quarter black velvet capes and carrying light gray muffs.

Fantastic Flower Motif from Nouvelle Suitte de Cahiers de Fleurs Idéales

label: Description
value: A central stem diverges to five separate branches. Three, at top, emerge into orange, teal, and light green lattices to suport floral arrangements of small blossoms in blue, pink, and lavender, respectively. Below, long thin floral arrangements in lavender (left) and blue (right) are flanked by long almond-shaped leaves, emerging from the blossoms perpendicularly. At left, in green, and at right, orange.

label: Physical description
value: Etching a la poupée and colored inks on paper

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. Two women seen from the back, both wearing white dresses with black scarves and high Spanish combs. One carries a yellow fan, the other has a yellow scarf over her head. In background, a second floor balcony sketched in graphite.

In background, group of soldiers and details of Spanish architecture.

Carte du Théatre de la Guerre

label: Description
value: Silk handkerchief showing a map of Asia Minor and the Eastern Mediterranean in black on a white field, with a blue border. The title, translated as Map of the Theater of War, probably refers to the Russo-Turkish War.

value: Medium: silk Technique: printed by engraved roller Label: silk printed by engraved roller

label: Description
value: Handkerchief divided into four quarters: two red squares show three lions passant; one blue square with a harp; and one white with a lion rampant inside a red frame.

label: Description
value: Narrow sash or belt of vertically ribbed silk plain weave. Pale blue ground with fine horizontal stripes of red, yellow, green, black, and white. Ends striped more broadly in same colors. Ends have short fringe formed by warp ends.

label: Description
value: Narrow sash or bet of vertically ribbed plain cloth. Pale blue ground with horizontal stripes of pink, yellow and white. Ends have short fringe formed by warp ends.

value: Broad sash of vertically ribbed silk plain cloth. Broad horizontal stripes of pink, blue and white. Narrow horizontal stripes of pink, blue, yellow, black, and white. Ends have long knotted blue fringe formed by warp ends.

label: Description
value: Broad sash of vertically ribbed silk plain cloth. Broad horizontal stripes of brilliant red, blue, green, black, and white. Narrow horizontal stripes of the same colors with the addition of yellow. Long knotted red silk fringe at ends formed by warp ends.

label: Description
value: Broad sash of vertically ribbed silk plain cloth. Striped horizontally pale blue, pink, white, and yellow. Long knotted white silk fringe formed by warp ends.
